org.pepstock.charba.client.impl.plugins.enums

Interface IsEnumeratedScheme

  • All Superinterfaces:
    ColorScheme, Key
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    BrewerScheme, GoogleChartScheme, GwtMaterialScheme, OfficeScheme, TableauScheme

    interface IsEnumeratedScheme
extends ColorScheme
    Internal interface of enumerated color scheme.
    Author:
    Andrea "Stock" Stocchero

    • Method Summary
